name: test_e2e_with_logs[004_SQLI_BLIND_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_002` |
| **Name** | Database name length discovery |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT LENGTH(database()))>5 --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20LENGTH%28database%28%29%29%29%3E5%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:16:15.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_002-1767402975816-b5p33r pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_002 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20LENGTH%28database%28%29%29%29%3E5%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
01:16:15.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_002-1767402975816-b5p33r pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_002 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20LENGTH%28database%28%29%29%29%3E5%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
